title: Explore Your R Libraries
text: basic example shows solve common problem:
code: library(libminer) ## basic example code lib_summary() #>                                                                Library #> 1                                   C:/Program Files/R/R-4.3.1/library #> 2                        C:/Users/CCRE/AppData/Local/R/win-library/4.3 #> 3 C:/Users/CCRE/AppData/Local/Temp/RtmpyihBaH/temp_libpath472c5a5d62ca #>   n_packages #> 1         30 #> 2        206 #> 3          1  # Also can calculate sizes lib_summary(sizes = TRUE) #>                                                                Library #> 1                                   C:/Program Files/R/R-4.3.1/library #> 2                        C:/Users/CCRE/AppData/Local/R/win-library/4.3 #> 3 C:/Users/CCRE/AppData/Local/Temp/RtmpyihBaH/temp_libpath472c5a5d62ca #>   n_packages  lib_size #> 1         30  68858812 #> 2        206 447448547 #> 3          1     13697
